_source.name: Anthony Reo
_source.headline: Co-founder & Product ðŸ“Š at Bunch.ai | Building high-performance teams and cultures | We're Hiring!
_source.summary:
100% of companies have company culture. <3% of companies proactively manage it. 87% of companies report it as their biggest challenge and are looking for solutions. Bunch is the tool that makes culture manageable by analyzing communication & workflow data using machine learning and psychological research. Feel free to reach out at bunch.ai! Product Management x Social Innovation x  Creative Leadership Building PRODOPOLISâ€Šâ€”â€Ša global product community with utopian ideals.

activity.title: We always use the word Skateboard to remind ourselves what the V in MVP really means because Viability seems to be always the most controversial letter. But also in the Desirability, Viability, Feasibility triangle.

To my network and networks beyond my network, Bunch.ai is a finalist in the Startup of the Year competition, which our CEO Darja Gutnick will be attending in Boston in just over a week away and we're making one last push for support. And thank you so much if you have voted already and we hope to see you there and/or return with good news!  https://lnkd.in/dQcc3Cd  Just a note on the required UX:  1. Click VOTE  2. It opens a page where you need to select Bunch once again  3. Login (Facebook/LinkedIn)  4. Confirm the vote.  5. You will then see a "Your Vote for Bunch has been recorded" message. Only then its been recorded, thank you!  You can find out more about the competition here: https://lnkd.in/dR_nBdu

We always use the word Skateboard to remind ourselves what the V in MVP really means because Viability seems to be always the most controversial letter. But also in the Desirability, Viability, Feasibility triangle.
